title: Digital Marketing / Social Media Officer Job at Davruna Group
content:
Davruna Group, a Real Estate & E-commerce company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing / Social Media Officer
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos (Hybrid Role)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Are you a creative and experienced Digital Marketer with a passion for driving online visibility and engagement?
	We’re looking for a Digital Marketing/Social Media Officer to join our dynamic team at Davruna Group, a growing real estate and e-commerce brand in Lagos.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and execute engaging social media campaigns across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn).
	Create high-quality video content and handle video editing for promotional and product-related content.
	Design eye-catching graphics to support marketing efforts.
	Execute email marketing strategies that resonate with our audience.
	Manage and optimize Google Ads, Facebook/Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and TikTok promotions.
	Lead and monitor PPC campaigns to drive traffic and conversion.
	Craft compelling content and marketing strategies aligned with our brand goals.
	Analyze performance metrics and optimize campaigns for better ROI.


Requirements


	Proven experience in digital marketing and social media management.
	Proficiency in tools like Canva, Adobe Premiere Pro/CapCut, Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads, Mailchimp, etc.
	Strong portfolio of past campaigns, video content, or social media projects.
	Excellent communication and creative thinking skills.
	Must be Lagos-based and able to work in a hybrid capacity.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV and portfolio to: blessingofelix@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
